messages.title: Theresa May Needs Your Local Vote
messages.content: Just 11 days after you vote, the EU wants to start Brexit negotiations, with Britain. So whoever is Prime Minister must be up to the job and ready to start. Getting these negotiations right is central to everything. Our country's future and Bury North's future too. Get Brexit wrong, and we get everything wrong. From looking after our elderly, funding our schools and addressing immigration, everything depends on getting Brexit right.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Theresa May has a plan to make a success of Brexit and respect the will of the people. Only she can deliver the best Brexit deal.
Control and reduce immigration. Reduce and control immigration from Europe once we leave the EU.
Theresa May and Conservatives will cap off energy tariffs, take £1,250 out of your tax bill. Create better-paid jobs.
Under the Conservatives, there are more good and outstanding schools than ever before. Theresa May will give every child the best start in life.
It's vital that every family has the care they need. Theresa May will keep the economy strong to support NHS with more money.

mentions.tacticalSituation: A loss of just 6 seats and Theresa May’s government loses its majority – Putting Brexit negotiations at risk.

issues.brexitEurope: Getting these negotiations right is central to everything. Our country's future and Bury North's future too. Theresa May has a plan to make a success of Brexit and respect the will of the people.
issues.economy: Theresa May and Conservatives will cap off energy tariffs, take £1,250 out of your tax bill. Create better-paid jobs.
issues.education: Under the Conservatives, there are more good and outstanding schools than ever before. Theresa May will give every child the best start in life.
issues.health: It's vital that every family has the care they need. Theresa May will keep the economy strong to support NHS with more money.
issues.immigration: Control and reduce immigration. Reduce and control immigration from Europe once we leave the EU. Jeremy Corbyn doesn’t believe in getting control of immigration.

community.content: Theresa May has a plan to strengthen the Social Care system and make sure elderly people and others get support they need.

quotes.text: Sky-high immigration would continue for years under Jeremy Corbyn – the Labour leader signalled today.
Labour plots Brexit deal with other parties if Tories don’t win election majority.

images.caption: Photo of Theresa May addressing voters.
